plot: Crystalle was the most popular girl in high school - until she disappeared the night of her senior prom. Through flashbacks and interviews we learn what happened to this promising young beauty.
title: Death of a Valley Girl
plot_es: Crystalle was the most popular girl in high school - until she disappeared the night of her senior prom. Through flashbacks and interviews we learn what happened to this promising young beauty.
